document.full_text: rafael nadal beat andy murray in straight sets, setting up a matchup with roger federer, who put an end to novak djokovic's streak of 43 straight victories.
document.title: nadal and federer to meet in final
lines_and_colors: rafael nadal beat andy murray in straight sets, setting up a matchup with roger federer, who put an end to novak djokovic's streak of 43 straight victories.
